sentences.english: Professional building in the country with a demonstration effect.
sentences.chinese: 专业的建设在全国带有一定的示范作用。

sentences.english: Daye city or village women's federation of women's demonstration focused on building the village.
sentences.chinese: 该村还是大冶市妇联重点建设的巾帼示范村。

sentences.english: The construction of fine courses is a main component of the construction of an examplar higher vocational college.
sentences.chinese: 精品课程建设是示范院校专业建设的主要内涵。

sentences.english: In 2007, the state began to establish disaster-reduction demonstration communities.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，国家开展了减灾示范社区创建活动。

sentences.english: Now let's act out the model dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 现在让我们表演一下示范对话。

sentences.english: I carefully prepared a second model class, finally got the recognition.
sentences.chinese: 但我精心准备了第二次示范课，这次终于得到了表扬。

sentences.english: There also are plans to flight-test the scale model next year.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些计划试飞规模示范明年。

sentences.english: To see glass-making demonstrations, visit the tiny island of Murano.
sentences.chinese: 要看玻璃示范制作，就要前往小岛慕拉诺。

sentences.english: OK. I'll ask some groups to act it out.
sentences.chinese: 此表演让学生先准备，然后找几组来示范。

sentences.english: A brother initiate who is a skilled chef demonstrates vegetarian cooking . vegetarian stuffed cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪课上，厨师师兄示范美味素食餐点的料理方法。

sentences.english: There are many ideas for commercial-scale demonstration projects.
sentences.chinese: 还有很多关于商业规模示范项目的想法。

sentences.english: This furnace is used at the Anshan Iron and Steel Co. as demonstration furnace.
sentences.chinese: 该炉在鞍钢弓长岭球团厂获得成功应用并成为示范炉。

sentences.english: Genu bosom lies a demonstrative graph another relevant adjustment the method is " bridge-type lies " .
sentences.chinese: 膝胸卧位示范图另一相关的调整方法是“桥式卧位”。

sentences.english: Any mobile phone can be Swiss Diamond, these are just sample.
sentences.chinese: 什么手机都能镶钻的，这些只是示范图。

sentences.english: Here will be an important carrier of self-innovation and a model area of saving energy and reducing emission.
sentences.chinese: 这里将是自主创新的重要载体和节能减排的示范区。

sentences.english: Visit Juncao mushroom enterprises and industry demonstration parks.
sentences.chinese: 参观福建省菌草产业示范企业及示范园区。
